Static Methods

inline alpha(v : primevc.types.RGBA) : UInt

Returns the alpha value of a RGBA object as a UInt.

inline blue(v : primevc.types.RGBA) : UInt

Returns the blue color from a RGBA value as 0xBB

inline darken(v : primevc.types.RGBA, grayV : UInt) : primevc.types.RGBA

Darkens the RGBA color by the gray-amount (0-255).

inline green(v : primevc.types.RGBA) : UInt

Returns the green color from a RGBA value as 0xGG

inline lighten(v : primevc.types.RGBA, grayV : UInt) : primevc.types.RGBA

Lightens the RGBA color by the gray-amount (0-255).

inline red(v : primevc.types.RGBA) : UInt

Returns the red color from a RGBA value as 0xRR

inline rgb(v : primevc.types.RGBA) : UInt

Returns the RGB properties of a RGBA value as 0xRRGGBB.

inline setAlpha(v : primevc.types.RGBA, a : UInt) : primevc.types.RGBA

Replaces the alpha value of a RGBA object.

inline setBlue(v : primevc.types.RGBA, b : UInt) : primevc.types.RGBA

Replaces the blue value of a RGBA object.

inline setGreen(v : primevc.types.RGBA, g : UInt) : primevc.types.RGBA

Replaces the green value of a RGBA object.

inline setRed(v : primevc.types.RGBA, r : UInt) : primevc.types.RGBA

Replaces the red value of a RGBA object.

inline setRgb(v : primevc.types.RGBA, c : UInt) : primevc.types.RGBA

Replaces the RGB properties of a RGBA object.

inline tint(v : primevc.types.RGBA, tint : Float) : primevc.types.RGBA

Changes the tint of the RGBA color to the given float value (0 - 1).
